thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie
thread.title: David and Shirley O'Callaghan
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by David and Shirley O'Callaghan

author: David and Shirley O'Callaghan
title: David and Shirley O'Callaghan
text:
My Husband & I are with Energia less than a year now and so far our electricity payments have been reasonably affordable. They used to be much higher in the past.
To date we haven't had any issues that we can recall that needed attention & therefore haven't been in contact with anybody from the Company to make comments on how good or bad service has been, (we've only had to just submit metre readings).
